abstractText: Adult sturgeonsampling with setlinesprovides information of the vital statistics and health of the adult population. This method has been in place since this investigation began in 1978 and is an important toolfor evaluating changes in the adultsturgeon size structure and population trends. Other useful applications of our adult sampling program included providing broodstock female sturgeon for KTOI's hatchery propogation procedures and also provides test specimens for telemetry and movement studies.
title: Adult sturgeon setlining v1.0
